content.detailedDescription:
I was awakened at 2:38 a.M on 3/12/14 by a sound like my cellphone ring but it was only five notes. i opened my eyes and there was an image, about 2'x3' on the wall in front of me.  it was obviously bamboo trunks and leaves.  the image faded to black in about 3 seconds.  this has happened before with other images, like forest scenes.  these wake-up calls are usually accompanied by craft being sited outside my window.  this time my blinds were open.  i rolled over and there was a very large star-like object (as big or larger than venus or jupiter.)  every amateur astronomer with even a 70 power scope knows how fast the moon and stars are moving up there.  you have to keep adjusting your telescope constantly or the object drifts right out of our field of view in a few seconds.  knowing this, i positioned my view so that the bright object was against the window frame and waited.  the object did not move for 10 minutes.  after that, the angle started to increase from 45��� to about 50��� which was the opposite direction from the moon (which was visible and which decreased its angle during the time the bright object was both stationary and moving in a retrograde motion from earth's rotation.)  
     i determined then to get my nikon d7100 camera and do a telephoto long exposure shot, sort of thinking aloud, "if you don't want me to photograph you, you can leave before i get back with the camera."  it did not leave.  i held the camera against the glass and window frame and took the shot.  the camera automatically did  a 2 or 3 second exposure.  i will attempt to upload the full resolution photo.  it appears to have captured some detail, not just a sparkle as would be the case with venus or jupiter since i only have a 200mm optical telephoto zoom on the camera.  i have had more than 20 sightings since the first during the phoenix lights flap.  this is the first time i have ever attempted to take a picture of any of them.
content.summary: I was awakened at 2:38 am by a sound, there was an image of vegetation on my wall which faded away. i looked out the window and there was a large star-like object that didn't move for 10 minutes then moved slightly in the opposite direction of the moon.

content.detailedDescription: Driving along a road close to the mountain  s, attempted to take a scenery shot and my phone accidentally took a burst shot of three photos in a matter of a second or less and didn't realize until days later that there is an unidentified flying object, it was obviously going at such fast speeds my phone barley caught a glimpse of it and it moved a great distance by the time the next photo was taken, i am aware that there is alarming things going on around us while we're just living our daily lives, i've always believed but never knew i'd have evidence myself. i hope these three pictures help out in any way. america can't remain clueless. i am nervous scared and interested.
content.summary: Cell phone took accidental burst shot of three photos

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend at the time had a uncle in knightsten ca.We were going to babysit,so we arrived at the house around 9:00pm,and her uncle and aunt left.Everyone fell asleep,so i got in the car and went to pittsburg to pick up a friend to show him this huge house,and equestrian center in their backyard.I have been going here for 6 years and know the area well,so i get my friend and going into knightsten,we both noticed these red lights going across the road like a train tressel,but no train tracks,so i speed up and this thing wasn't getting any closer,so go faster,and still can't get closer,well anyway,i can't find the house,going every direction,for 2 hrs.I finally found a payphone and called the house,and i was just right around the corner,but didn't see the house,which you can't miss.We lost 2hrs time,and still bothers us today in 2014,this happened in 1990
content.summary: I was driving right at it,and it got no closer or further.It stayed same distance.Lost 2hrs time

content.detailedDescription: It was at night.  probably somewhere about 9:00 pm.  i was driving to the grocery store in twentynine palms, ca.  as i got to the corner... i could see approx. 5 bright lights in the sky... like in a line.  i thought that odd since that is not the norm.  then i thought to get my camera out.  i filmed a little bit of it and then turned the corner and parked in the parking lot of the grocery store i was headed to.  i grabbed my camera and aimed them at the lights.  this time, more lights appeared.  they went from straight lines to a formation line up.  they stayed that way for a while and then they faded out one by one.  as the lights were disappearing... i could have sworn i heard one or more airplane/helicopter in the area.  i saw a flashing red light in the sky only.  and it was very faint.  the sky had been cloudy as usually you can see a lot of stars out.  that's it!
content.summary: I saw a series of low altitude lights in a sequence hovering above the ground at night.  i took video.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a weekend about the 8th of feb 2014, not looking at calender. just got thru with a kayak trip down the san marcos river. it was about a hour after sunset and i was waiting on my partner to come back with his vehicle so we could load the kayaks. i was laying in the grass smoking a cigarette looking at the stars. i noticed one star was moving across the sky straight above me. not sure what direction but can figure out by location. i thought it was a sat mainly because it moved slower and higher ther aircraft. still watching it i observed it stop and then start fluttering in place. the object would do this for a second, come to a stop and then flutter again for about a second. it did this 3 or 4 times then i noticed down and to the right a second star like object flutter. i don't know if i did not notice it or it was already there. the first object fluttered back and the second object stopped fluttering. a third star like object a half second later fluttered directly below the first object and left to the second object making a perfect triangle. the third object fluttered and then the the first object fluttered, at that time the space directly below the triangle shifted and the size that i saw shift was about the same size as the triangle. it looked exactly like when star trek ships going into cloaking mode. after that all three objects was not there and everything that i thought i saw was gone. partner came back and we loaded up then left.
just passing along what i saw. we r stupid if we think a civilization out there can't be a million yrs more advanced!
content.summary: Witnessed a star like object move slowly in straight line then stop and start fluttering. it did that about 3 times then i noticed that created a second star light a object do the same thing. the first responded back then a third one creating a triangle.

content.detailedDescription: My friend had a apartment on the top floor of the building. that day a few friends were having a blue fish roast on the roof. there were no drugs involved and any beer was gone when i arrived. the building which is situated right next to 46 street park you can see west across the hudson river and east toward the east side of manhattan. the 8 to ten people who were there were looking toward the west side of the roof and you can see planes lights landig and taking off from that vantage point. some were saying the lights of the planes were ufos. i knew they weren't and walked toward the other side of the roof. i looked up toward the empire state building and above me was a huge triangle shaped ship ufo i don't know. i stared at it for ten seconds i think and then i had to turn away because i felt someone on that ufo was looking at me. i yelled at the other people on the roof to look in the same direction but no one turned around. when i looked up again it was gone. no noise just gone. years later when i asked my friend about it he told me i never spoke about it. i can tell you i have been in law enforcement for nearly 29 years and i have heard stories from other officers who have had their own experiences. i'm not a fraud i know what i saw and that's my story.
content.summary: Standing on roof top midtown

content.detailedDescription: I came outside my apartment to have a cigarette then i looked up and saw it about 700 ft. in front of me as high as the tree line. i immediately knew it was a real ufo and i ran towards it. it decended fast down behind the apartment building across from mine that is two stories high. it fluttered and had so many bright flashing lights. i ran over to see where it landed then. i had my head turned right to where it would have been but then it popped up really quick above the building at the other end. it saw me and started coming closer and closer to me at a slow pace. it was right above my head. about 500 ft above me. i was saying in my head thinking it was intelligent it would hear me say follow me. it started following me as i said this numerous times in my head. i walked backwards back into the court where my building is and it stopped back in the same place it was before it decended. it flashed really bright and then it dimmed and decended again. when i ran over to see it again it was gone.The security saw it and was chasing it with there truck. i knew they had saw it also. my three neighbors saw it as well. i have video for three minutes of it and the next day i took three photographs with my phone during the day by my house and there is a green object in the photos. the date was march 7 at 10 pm
content.summary: Quick intelligent fluttering dance object

content.detailedDescription:
About 205pm this afternoon, i'm sitting in my backyard, watching the clouds float gently across the sky. i see a cluster of 5 small clouds. i estimate that they were 10-20 miles north. after going for a drive in that direction a little later, the clouds were really 50-100 miles away. to the right of the clouds i see a tiny white dot. it looks like a silver mylar balloon. it's stationary. the clouds are moving. the dot begins to move, a little slower, but in the same direction. it becomes stationary again. once again, it begins to move, but this time, it keeps up with the clouds. then, it's stationary again. it begins to move again, but in the opposite direction of the clouds. once the clouds have passed the area of the dot, the dot is gone. the odd part was, sometimes you see the dot. sometimes you didn't. it was behind the clouds.

it could have been a mylar balloon, but not likely because it was 100+ miles away. i couldn't see that. it could have been a star, but stars don't move in different directions and it would have been visible for more than 5 minutes. it could have been the sun reflecting off a plane, but it was too far and eventually, a plane would have traveled in one direction. 

this is the 2nd time in less than a year i have seen something in the sky that i could not explain. both times, the objects were way to high to be planes and for me to actually see them if they were planes. i have seen 3 planes since seeing the dot and they are much lower, but you could clearly see they were planes. what ever it was, it was over 100 miles away and i could still see it. it must have been huge.....As was the last one.

after seeing the first one, i checked the internet to see if anyone else saw what i did. someone did. today i checked and another california resident reported seeing a large white dot in the sky (mufon‬ case #54590) around the same time. they were in extreme northern california
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White dot 100+ miles away in the direction of death valley

content.detailedDescription: My father and i were driving to pick up prescriptions at a local pharmacy when out of nowhere a blue-white light suddenly appeared on the horizon. it was moving awkardly and hovering. we observed it as we went into the parking lot and parked the car. we walked a little bit closer to it, mostly so i could try and see if i could get a definitive shape of the object. it started to move closer to us so we decided to play it safe and went into the pharmacy to pick up the medication. when we left it wasn't there anymore. about ten minutes later we left a nearby starbucks and i spotted it to our right which was eastward. it was hovering mostly then all of a sudden accelarated to blazing speeds, i would put it between 500-600 mph, and was gone in the blink of an eye. right before it disappeared i got a little bit of a closer look and saw the light coming from the bottom of the craft and the craft had an oval/hat like shape to it. on the way home we saw multiple airplanes so we know for a fact it wasn't that. the object also emitted no sound, it was dead quiet. i'm very positive this is nothing that the common person knows. this object moved way too fast to be a conventional plane, made no noise which a helicopter would do and was visible both in the twilight and in the dark.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A blue-white light moving extremely fast, side to side with moments of hovering. left in blink of an eye.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of march10.And countless others,typically about the same time,i encountered,at very close proximity,2-dimly lit orbs coming out from over the pacific,heading east,south-east,towards los angeles area.I am former military and have never seen any known aircraft behave in such manner and w\o sound and maneuverability.This phenomena is currently ongoing and always disrupts my satellite feed and internet momentarily.
content.summary: 2 orbs followed eachother in close proximity and at times waivered.An ongoing event.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking south on gladstone ave south of hubbard street in sylmar ca to visit a friend about 9am in the morning. this was in 1981. i was 21 yrs. old at the time. i looked up and could not believe what i was seeing. it was a huge round silvery object. it was so metallic that it looked actually like a big mirror ball. i could see the clouds reflecting off it as they were going by with a very light wind. i thought to myself if i take my eyes off it--it would just blend in the sky and i could never find it again. it was hovering above about 150 to 200 yards above me. i would have never believed in ufo's if i hadn't seen it myself or other people told me they saw one. i was walking looking up at it with my eyes fixed hoping i could get to my friends house down the street, then a bunch of dogs in a yard i was walking by were barking and it startled me and i looked away. i tried to find the ufo again but it was out of my sight. 
i didn't know who to call to report it at the time, only thing i could think of is the police and i wasn't going to call the police.
content.summary: Walking down gladstone in sylmar 9am looked up and saw round reflective sphere silver like a mirror, you could see the clouds reflecting off it.

content.detailedDescription: Early morning when i was 4. playing in my bedroom. i remember this little dark grey person sitting next to me and he told me without speaking that we had to go. i was very afraid. he pointed up with his hand. the next thing i remember i was next to him looking through the heating vent down into my bedroom. he then told me without speaking that everything was ok and to go down into my bedroom. next thing i remember i'm sitting on the floor of my bedroom like nothing happened. i am 51 years old and still cannot look at a heating vent without fear.
content.summary: Played with me and told me to go with him i was about 4 years old

content.detailedDescription: Nov. 2013, i was looking for "ison" around mars area. had 10x50 binoculars, when a cloud like " poof" similar to someone puffing out cigar smoke caught my eye.I have seen these in the past through my lx 200 8", but thought it was just my eyes& the light playing tricks. this time it was a lasting cloud like dim bluish/ grey glow. then it seemed to compact into a tighter area, & became brighter and more white. it all seemed to go slower now,& descended. it then became oval and took on an orange color, shape like the classic saucer.Amber/orange sparks were falling/trailing from benieth it. a small tourquose ball formed next to it, went behind the oval, came around the left side of it and merged with the big shape. there were snaps of all different colors coming from this thing, mainly from the outer edges. no pattern, just all over, haphazard like. it shot to the right about 2 hand widths. wiggled left to right and back for a bit, then the far side of it seemed to raise up, a black arrow shape appeared toward the center, it flashed brightly once, the next flash, it vanished, or took off! i thought about thisfor a long time. all i could figure out is it may have been meteoric powder( iron or rock?) heated, polarized, drew together, and took off toward it's strongest pull from the earth. the whole thing lasted 2 minutes tops. cool though!
content.summary: Saw ufo form then leave

content.detailedDescription:
Saucer, low hum, loud snapping sound( ruler on desktop), glowing gangly arm like appendages, slow movement, slow spinning action, caused leaves to fall from small tree, off-white, grey, and red surface.


1: i was in my house, watching tv.
2: noticed the object from loud snapping sound( ruler on desktop).
3: i did not know what to think
4: saucer shape, spun slowly and smoothly on a center axis, moved side to side 5-10 feet,
5: panic, fear, hyperventilation, could not think straight.
6: the object flew out of sight at a fast speed.
content.summary: Low hum, loud snapping sound (ruler on desktop)

content.detailedDescription:
Monday march 3, 2014 strange object
strange object in the sky last night. 
on monday night, march 3 at about 9:35 pm as i was sitting in front of my desk in my workshop, i glanced out the window and saw a very bright light approaching in the sky. leaving near the airport, this is very common of course. what was different this time though was in the brightness of the object and the complete lack of any flashing lights such as what would be seen on an airplane. 
it appeared to be somewhat round in shape though it was more of a bright, roundish blur so no solid shape was discernible. colour was a bright orange/ red, more on the orange side.
i watched it as it approached, coming in from north/ northwest and appearing brighter and larger as it came. as it started to go over the roof, i quickly jumped up and ran outside and behind the shop, expecting the object to be veering towards the airport. i then saw it further to the east than i expected and observed a sudden change of direction further to the east. not a gradual banked turn such as an airplane would make, this was more of an instant change in direction. it did this twice, just seconds apart. now heading directly away from me to the east, the bright object then faded out quickly over the next few seconds. total time since i first saw it coming to when it was gone from site was roughly 1 and a half to 2 minutes. the entire time there were no flashing lights and it did not make any sound at all. 
at its brightest, from where i was first observing it from the workshop, the brightness was comparable to a full moon on a clear night. it was far larger in the sky than any star, planet or space station would appear. our local astronomer also confirmed that it could not have been the space station as the timing was off by a couple of hours.
what was it? i have no idea. it certainly did not behave like any aircraft i have ever seen.  one other person also contacted me and described the object to me and the description matched with what i saw. and i had not yet described just what i had seen. he also is from an entirely different part of town than i am.  

in the following days, i have had 2 friends tell me they have had similar sightings in the area over the last year or so, including up to 1 of these objects flying in apparent formation.
content.summary: Extremely bright object flying overhead, no blinking lights. bright orangish red colour. sudden change in direction.

content.detailedDescription: Driving east on kaloli ave 8:35 pm, in the direction of the pacific ocean ,me and my friend observed 5 or 6 orange colored objects flying in a formation, we puled over on a side st for a better view point, i brought my vehicle to a stop and turned off the lights and engine,the objects were fading as they flew away from us in a westerly direction, i took 4 pictures with my i-phone 5, we observed the objects fade behind the cloud as they flew in the westerly direction, another object appeared out of the east it was also orange in color and followed the preceding objects and eventually faded from our view, upon reviewing the photos i took i realised that one of the objects had visible structure, which i could not recognise as any known aircraft
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed 5-6 objects ,flying in a formation. east to west , orange in color

content.detailedDescription:
This story was reported to me by my grand-daughter's husband who was returning from colorado. at approximately 7:00 on the morning of march 10th, he and two others witnessed a blue orb-like object that hovered, then took off at a high rate of speed. he stated there were no other cars on the highway at that time. 

he told me that although he was a "believer" in ufos, he had never witnessed anything like this before and wanted to know what it was.

he reported this incident to me as i am a field investigator for mufon(#16829)and they have no permanent phone and no email currently. he did fill out a paper copy of the incident that i made available.
content.summary: While returning home to michigan from colorado, witnessed a bluish orb-shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: I hear a couple hawks squawking in the sky and went outside to see what was going on. they were flying high in a circle then i noticed a bit higher was a bright white orb. i called my son to come out and look. we both watched it move quickly across the sky in a horizontal line for a few seconds and it disappeared. we just had a 6.9 earthquake right off our coast a couple days ago. i'm positive it was not a balloon. we live in a very unpopulated area.
content.summary: Bright white orb in sky moving quickly straight path then vanished

content.detailedDescription: Took 235 photos 25 second exposure 55 seconds apart night time sky i do this a lot and this time i had some unexplained lights. i take the shot and use movie maker to make a short video this one is 14 seconds long and normally everything moves a bit but this time something isn't right. i will send the video but i have save all 235 photos. i used a cheap canon powershot a560 and the "chdk" to allow me to take the longer exposures the details on the photos say 15 seconds but due to chdk they are really 25 seconds. when you watch the video watch the top of the screen notice the stars that come to being bright and not move like all the stars normally do watch it a couple times and you will see it. not saying its a ufo but you can see what airplanes look like on the video. and if needed i will be glad to send you all 235 shots but need a better way to send then just 1 at a time.
content.summary: Took 235 photos 25 second exposure 55 seconds apart unexplained lights

content.detailedDescription: I was walking into may room when i saw a black half circle just their on my wooden bench. it stared right into my eyes like it was trying to tell me something telepathically. i was shocked and scared because i did not know what it was going to do next. then i thought i heard a noise from behind me so i turned around and then turned back to look at this thing and it was just gone.
content.summary: I saw a black half circle just their on my wooden bench staring at me with its glowing eye's trying to tell me something telepathically.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside my house smoking a cigarette around noon time when i observed a object from the east coming towards me.Did not realize it was something unusual til it got almost right above me and i saw it was a solid black sphere making no noise and also seemed to be lower than most aircraft i see in my area. at first i thought it may be a drone but when i got a good look at it , it appeared to be a solid black sphere.
content.summary: Was outside my house smoking a cigarette when i observed a object from the east coming towards me.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in my backyard making sure my garage door was locked.

2. it's brightness and speed. also its path wasn't consistent.

3. i wasn't sure what it was but i know what it wasn't. it wasn't anything i'm used to seeing flying in the sky. 

4. the object appeared bigger and brighter than any star and smaller than the moon. it hovered, then it made a sudden movement to one side, it hovered, it came back hovered some more and it looked like it was descending when i lost sight of it.

5. i stood in awe, happy to get video but not sure what to make of it. i felt a bit scared when i first saw it and it looked like it was coming at me. it was also weird that it was almost straight up on top of my house. 

6. it looked like it was descending behind my house. i got up on a ladder but it was gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw the same object about 2 weeks ago but it was gone too fast and didn't give me a chance to take video. however, the video doesn't really capture the clarity and brightness of what i saw. i took it with my iphone.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friends were screwing around and saw some lights and we saw this strange ghost like thing engulf one of my friends dogs because it ran up barking at it. after it was engulfed it collapsed and the thing hovered onto this planet looking thing and took off. after we ran up to the dog and it wasn't breathing...He was sad of course. i was scared for my life.
content.summary: Decended from the sky, was scared for life.

content.detailedDescription: I when out to look at the starts like i always do i saw a few red lights in the sky i dont know if it was one craft or a few it was short so i couldnt get more detail
content.summary: Looked like chopper but you could see that there was more mass to it but there are red lights that flew ahead or away maybe it was part of the same craft

content.detailedDescription: I came outside to have a look around as always i look into the skies when weather permits and after seeing an unusual looking circle of lights i continue to look and seen it was moving a little and had more lights than an airplane, i went to get my binoculars after realizing this is really something different then i take out my telescope to get better look and that's when i see that this is an unidentifiable flying object to me. then i notice a man walking his dog and he ask me what it was and i said i don't know but it is different from anything iv'e seen since being in the military in germany at which time i seen a red light blinking possibly 1000.Ft in the air and suddenly sped off at unimaginable speed and stopped on a dime and began to blink again then seconds later sped off again and just disappeared into space . so this just reminded me of that night all over again, im just glad there was someone else who seen it or my wife would probably be a little sceptical without evidence. so that's what i seen , not much but very exciting to me.
content.summary: Round with glowing lights,moving very slowly i only notice because of it's lights and i frequently look into the skies because i love the beauty of  it all.

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to smoke a cig around 1:40 am 03/11/2014. facing west, a very bright light just barely out in front of me maybe a mile or two hovering in the sky caught my attention. it had an amber glow to it, as if it was reflecting light causing beams shooting from it. the amber lights began to blink. i saw three distinct separate lights blinking in patterns. at this time i noticed a second bright light approx a mile apart, and parallel to the first. it was emitting the same amber color blinking in a different pattern. the amber lights stopped and the object was lit white, then both began to change color, from bright blue, to green, then to yellow then to bright red. this continued for the next approx 15 minutes as the crafts stayed parallel, but traveled west, maybe northwest rather slowly as it took 15 minutes to travel approx 80 deg. the object further off then disappeared over the horizon. the second object kept going further northwest then was blocked by houses. 

due to the light refraction and hovering in one spot, i first thought the object was a bright star, until i noticed the second one and they were the same color and blinking in similar patterns. the objects were close enough that as i looked harder i could see distinct separate lights possibly on the bottom of the crafts. 

as they started moving further away, they were changing colors, it was as if they were morphing colors, not blinking. 

i felt as though there had to be other people seeing this also as it made such vibrant colors.
i also thought to myself, after all the times i have sat outside for literally hours just watching the sky and monitoring the earths rotation, why am i seeing them only now, completely random and when i wasn't looking for them. 

i lost sight of the objects as they went over the horizon
content.summary: Blinking, color changing lights hovered for roughly 10 min, then flew west possibly northwest and went over horizon over the next 10-15 min. colors ranged from solid red, to blue, to green. looked like separate set of amber/gold lights blinked in pattern

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Initially saw a descending blue light, like a meteor low on the horizon. light then rose back up and moved erratically at a high rate of speed, changing color from solid bright blue to solid pale red. hovered at times, diving, then back up and moving erratically. general area appeared to be over san diego naval base. object was in sky for about 15 minutes. during the event our satellite tv lost reception. object then disappeared below the horizon. distance seemed to be at least 10 miles out. no blinking light such as seen on normal aircraft. attempted to videotape but could not get a fix on the object, even though other lights recorded clearly.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright solid blue light flying erratically then hovering, then diving

content.detailedDescription:
Today in early morning i was saw an other one ufo event but this one was a lot better than 8-3-2014
a lot of orb or fireball lights with some of them turned 180 degrees an other one goes very low and an other one was to much low.
i record with my poor camera of sony xperia mini st15i the ufo event but it cant record the lights except one that you see in pictures.
this one you can see in daylight with my finger where it was. after 8-9 min it gone's
my camera cant record any of the stars and the moon if i record it you will see only a cute light. don't expect so much from my camera
sorry for my english.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: That one was bettter a lot better

content.detailedDescription: I have been noticing these strange lights for a while now right out the back of our home, and they are in the front too, but i smoke out back... this time my mom saw it too!!! she just happened to be saying goodnight, and telling me she was going up to bed, so i told her to look up at a different light which was moving very strangely as a small plane approached what looked like merely a few feet from that light thing, then as soon as the plane was past that strange light which mostly seemed to be hovering still again at this point.  so my mom stood there for a moment to see that, then all the sudden at about the exact second we both noticed to the far left of the strange light i had pointed out, a very close very low orange to sort of red egg shaped or orb like light.  we both kind of say look at that one, i asked mom where did that come from, it weren't there a second ago, and she agreed, and i, not thinking pointed at it.  so then it very slowly came right at me, it changed altitude a few times, at this point i was kinda freaking out.  i was scared so, i moved away from mom and asked her to stay at the back door step area, she wanted me to come on in, but i needed to see it.  i also felt the need to sign to it that i saw it, and i knew what it was, i really didn't mean to lie to it though, i have no stinking idea what it was, and now i am scared, i keep seeing these lights up there, all around, but never this close.  why did i point at the thing?  and then signal to it like that?  our little jack russel dog was also very scared.  this was just tonight, it was just a little while ago, i would love to know if anyone else in this area seen that!  there is something very scary happening around here!  i always thought when the other lights are/were up further in the sky that they were more of a perfect circle, some being a triangular shape, but this one has me wondering, as it seemed perfectly round when we first saw it, but then it got so close and just above me and i noticed it was an egg shape more than a circle. what was that?  should i be worried?  i am a believer in jesus christ, and while i do mess up, like lying in a moment of fear to a unknown glowing flying object, telling it i know what it is when i really don't know at all; i tell you that my lord and savior knows that what i am telling you i just saw, and my mom just saw as well, is exactly as i just described it.  i need answers more than ever before.  i intend to try to catch these things on my cheap cell phone cam and learn how to send them to this form or youtube.  however when i try to cam the lights in the sky they wont show up, i am new to all this, but i now need to know, and want video or pics to show anyone else who would be able to tell me what it is!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I still cant believe it was so close, right above my head before that it was coming straight at me!

content.detailedDescription: 5:30 am approached the south bound 99 freeway, here on the left side of car i noticed a bright pulsating spherical light, that at first i assumed was venus, being that it looked so close and was very bright. however the more i stared at it i then realized that it began to fade until it was a miniscule speck in the sky (like a far dim star) but soon after it dimmed, the sphere began to grow again enlarging in size and brightness until it again resembled the brightness and closeness of venus. i observed this behavior continue for an hour. i however was able to capture photos with my iphone and tried as best as i could to get the clarity.
content.summary: Was driving on 99 freeway southbound and saw a sphereical bright light that grew brighter and then would dim to a small speck seen activity for more than an hour
